summary: Old man invites three of his illegitimate children to live with him.
cast: Marion Davies|Ralph Forbes|C. Aubrey Smith|Ray Milland|Guinn 'Big Boy' Williams|David Torrence|Doris Lloyd|Edgar Norton|Nina Quartero|Halliwell Hobbes|Elizabeth Murray|James Gordon|Harry Allen|Rina De Liguoro|Bobbie Hale
title: Papá solterón
